climbs.name: Youthful Indiscretion ( aka Wisdom of Age).

content.description: Despite being out of the way and short, this route has some fun moves right off the ground and continues up and over a bulge to easy climbing on a slab to the anchors. The crux can be interesting for many to figure out as they are trying to get both feet off the ground. A shoulder start is another option and gives your friends a good laugh.
content.location: This route is the left most of two bolted lines on Follies of Youth Block.

content.description: Start up Youthful Indiscretion pulling a V1-ish move off the ground to much bigger holds. Traverse right across the slab face to the first bolt out right. Delightful holds takes one past more bolts to a set of top anchors.
content.location: Right side of the Follies of Youth Block

content.description: A small block sits just past Angel Flight Buttress. There is 3 routes on this little crag, all sport.
